Posted By: Adam J. Baxter
This card has been SOLD!

"Scrappy" Bill Joyce, the poor, short, little street urchin that nobody wanted, has found a new home! 

Due to the laws here in The People's Republic of Massachusetts I must leave the details of the adoption private. I can assure all of you that he is going to a good home.

Thanks--Adam
